verses.verse: Now Sarai <S%H8297><s%> Abram's <S%H87><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> bore him no children: <S%H3205><s%> <S%H3808><s%> and she had an handmaid, <S%H8198><s%> an Egyptian, <S%H4713><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Hagar. <S%H1904><s%>

And Sarai <S%H8297><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Abram, <S%H87><s%> Behold <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath restrained <S%H6113><s%> me from bearing: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3205><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> go in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> my maid; <S%H8198><s%> it may be <S%H194><s%> that I may obtain children <S%H1129><s%> by <S%H4480><s%> her. And Abram <S%H87><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Sarai. <S%H8297><s%>

And Sarai <S%H8297><s%> Abram's <S%H87><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> Hagar <S%H1904><s%> her maid <S%H8198><s%> the Egyptian, <S%H4713><s%> after <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7093><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> had dwelt <S%H3427><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> her to her husband <S%H376><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> to be his wife. <S%H802><s%>

And he went in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Hagar, <S%H1904><s%> and she conceived: <S%H2029><s%> and when she saw <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> she had conceived, <S%H2029><s%> her mistress <S%H1404><s%> was despised <S%H7043><s%> in her eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

And Sarai <S%H8297><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Abram, <S%H87><s%> My wrong <S%H2555><s%> be upon <S%H5921><s%> thee: I <S%H595><s%> have given <S%H5414><s%> my maid <S%H8198><s%> into thy bosom; <S%H2436><s%> and when she saw <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> she had conceived, <S%H2029><s%> I was despised <S%H7043><s%> in her eyes: <S%H5869><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> judge <S%H8199><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and thee.

But Abram <S%H87><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Sarai, <S%H8297><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> thy maid <S%H8198><s%> is in thy hand; <S%H3027><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> to her as it pleaseth <S%H2896><s%> <S%H5869><s%> thee. And when Sarai <S%H8297><s%> dealt hardly <S%H6031><s%> with her, she fled <S%H1272><s%> from her face. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%>

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> her by <S%H5921><s%> a fountain <S%H5869><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the fountain <S%H5869><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> to Shur. <S%H7793><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Hagar, <S%H1904><s%> Sarai's <S%H8297><s%> maid, <S%H8198><s%> whence <S%H335><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> camest <S%H935><s%> thou? and whither <S%H575><s%> wilt thou go? <S%H1980><s%> And she said, <S%H559><s%> I <S%H595><s%> flee <S%H1272><s%> from the face <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of my mistress <S%H1404><s%> Sarai. <S%H8297><s%>

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto her, Return <S%H7725><s%> to <S%H413><s%> thy mistress, <S%H1404><s%> and submit thyself <S%H6031><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> her hands. <S%H3027><s%>

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto her, I will multiply thy seed exceedingly, <S%H7235><s%> <S%H7235><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2233><s%> that it shall not <S%H3808><s%> be numbered <S%H5608><s%> for multitude. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7230><s%>

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto her, Behold, <S%H2009><s%> thou art with child, <S%H2030><s%> and shalt bear <S%H3205><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> and shalt call <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Ishmael; <S%H3458><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H413><s%> thy affliction. <S%H6040><s%>

And he <S%H1931><s%> will be <S%H1961><s%> a wild <S%H6501><s%> man; <S%H120><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> will be against every man, <S%H3605><s%> and every man's <S%H3605><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> against him; and he shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the presence <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> his brethren. <S%H251><s%>

And she called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> her, Thou <S%H859><s%> God <S%H410><s%> seest <S%H7210><s%> me: for <S%H3588><s%> she said, <S%H559><s%> Have I also <S%H1571><s%> here <S%H1988><s%> looked <S%H7200><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him that seeth <S%H7200><s%> me?

Wherefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the well <S%H875><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Beer-lahai-roi; <S%H883><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is between <S%H996><s%> Kadesh <S%H6946><s%> and Bered. <S%H1260><s%>

And Hagar <S%H1904><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> a son: <S%H1121><s%> and Abram <S%H87><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> his son's <S%H1121><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Hagar <S%H1904><s%> bore, <S%H3205><s%> Ishmael. <S%H3458><s%>

And Abram <S%H87><s%> was fourscore <S%H8084><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> when Hagar <S%H1904><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> to Abram. <S%H87><s%>
